availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Levi Patterson (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda B. Patterson in Bourbon County, Kentucky, on May 4, 1864. Father of James Patterson. Resident of Harrison County in 1850. Household owned five enslaved persons in Harrison County including two listed as fugitives in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860 including Elijah [Unknown] and Hubbard [Unknown].
